item.title: The Kinect is selling really well; but is that good for gamers?
item.description: With the Kinect seemingly moving 2.5 million units so soon after release, does this bode well for what we can expect in the future?

item.title: Muramasa: The Demon Blade - Complete weapon listing

item.title: The Wii for gamers
item.description: Finding games for average gamers is almost as difficult as finding them for hardcore gamers, it seems.
